Title: Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards
Plot: Gabrielle wants to enter the Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards, but finds that it is not quite what she thought it would be. She helps another aspiring bard discover his true storytelling talent.
GuestStars: Dean O'Gorman, Grahame Moore, Patrick Brunton, David Weatherley, Joseph Manning, Bernard Moody, Lori Dungey
